com.htc.lib1.duallens

Class DimensionPlusView

  • java.lang.Object
    • GLSurfaceView
      • com.htc.lib1.duallens.DimensionPlusView

  • public class DimensionPlusView
extends GLSurfaceView
    Let viewer see DimensionPlus image from different angles by gyro(float, float).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DimensionPlusView.DimensionPlusRenderer
      The default Renderer works for DimensionPlusView

        protected DimensionPlusView.DimensionPlusRenderer mRenderer

    • Constructor Detail

      • DimensionPlusView

        public DimensionPlusView(Context context)
        Standard View constructor. It sets a default renderer by calling setupRenderer(), you don't need to call setRenderer(Renderer) by yourself.

      • DimensionPlusView

        public DimensionPlusView(Context context,
                 AttributeSet attrs)
        Standard View constructor. It sets a default renderer by calling setupRenderer(), you don't need to call setRenderer(Renderer) by yourself.

    • Method Detail

      • setupRenderer

        protected void setupRenderer()
        Override it if you have custom DimensionPlusView.DimensionPlusRenderer. It is called by standard constructors.

      • setRenderer

        public void setRenderer(Renderer renderer)
        Set the renderer associated with this view. Renderer must be a DimensionPlusView.DimensionPlusRenderer.
        Parameters:
        renderer - the renderer to use to perform OpenGL drawing. Must be a DimensionPlusView.DimensionPlusRenderer.

      • loadDimensionPlusFile

        public void loadDimensionPlusFile(java.lang.String filePath)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Load DimensionPlus image to the associated Renderer. If the file cannot be decoded into a DimensionPlusView, an IOException throws.
        Parameters:
        filePath - complete path name for the file to be decoded.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • gyro

        public void gyro(float inputX,
        float inputY)
        Change camera position by the angular speed around the x-axis/y-axis. This is designed to work with the gyroscope. See android.hardware.Sensor#TYPE_GYROSCOPE for more details.
        Parameters:
        inputX - Angular speed around the x-axis
        inputY - Angular speed around the y-axis
        See Also:
        android.hardware.SensorManager}, android.hardware.SensorEvent}, android.hardware.Sensor}

      • release

        public void release()
        Must be called if this renderer is no longer used.
